source:
#Create DataFrame for the sstparcelunion LMS Table
sstparcelunion = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Semi Structured Data/OPS/sstparcelunion.parquet', format='parquet')
sstparcelunion.createOrReplaceTempView("sstparcelunion")

#Create DataFrame for the ssttrackunion LMS Table
ssttrackunion = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Semi Structured Data/OPS/ssttrackunion.parquet', format='parquet')
ssttrackunion.createOrReplaceTempView("ssttrackunion")

#Create DataFrame for the dbowaybillsperparcel LMS Table
dbowaybillsperparcel = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbowaybillsperparcel.parquet', format='parquet')
dbowaybillsperparcel.createOrReplaceTempView("dbowaybillsperparcel")

#Create DataFrame for the dbowaybill LMS Table
dbowaybill = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbowaybill.parquet', format='parquet')
dbowaybill.createOrReplaceTempView("dbowaybill")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
sstwaybillsperparcelunion_tmp1
AS
SELECT 
    p.id as parcelid,
    p.waybillid
FROM SSTParcelUnion p
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    w.parcelid,
    w.waybillid
FROM dbowaybillsperparcel w

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
sstwaybillsperparcel
AS
SELECT DISTINCT
    parcelid as lms_waybillsperparcel_parcelid,
    waybillid as lms_waybillsperparcel_waybillid,
    b.loadid as lms_waybillsperparcel_loadid
FROM sstwaybillsperparcelunion_tmp1 a
LEFT JOIN dbowaybill b on b.id = a.waybillid
